songs.title: June Haverly
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
June Haverly
You always get your way
But, June Haverly
Not today
No, not today

[Chorus]
You're on top of the world
Just trying to stay on track
And they'll kiss your feet
While they stab your back
And watch your star
Burn to blaze and cry

[Verse]
June Haverly
You always got your way
But not today
No, not today

[Verse 2]
June Haverly
You're not to blame
No, not to blame
And, June Haverly
Don't be ashamed
For all the pain

[Chorus]
You're on top of the world
Just trying to stay on track
And they'll kiss your feet
While they stab your back
And watch your star
Burn to blaze and cry

[Bridge]
June Haverly
We miss you so
Why'd you go?
Oh, why'd you go?

[Chorus]
You're on top of the world
Just trying to stay on track
And they'll kiss your feet
While they stab your back
And watch your star
Burn to blaze and cry

[Bridge]
June Haverly
We miss you so
Why'd you go?
Oh, why'd you go?
